name: Xander: 7-Shot
description:
Xander: 7-Shot, the SHMUP that serves to be the prequel to the main campaign of Xander: Shard Travellers, is a game made by Stargaze Studio. Specifically for the 32bit Spring Cleaning Jam!

Follow Xander, the self-proclaimed Warping Hero as he needs to stop the Fallen Hero's forces and save the universe from collapsing.

In this initial release, only Classic & Endless mode will be avaliable. With the Story mode alongside multiple characters making it's way later down the line, keep an eye on the twitter page for more info!

Stargaze Studio's Twitter Page
